parameters: \|Oh, you must be the new champion they sent to reclaim the throne.
\.Another fool, blinded by the greed of gold.
\.Are you not them? What happened to them?
We used to be part of them. \.
But we are no longer bound by their weakness.
So... you're not Adam and Belle... \|What are you?
We are the true rulers of this castle.\|
The ones who broke free from the chains of weakness.\|
We are the "Beast" in "Adam's" word, the reason you are here.
I thought you supposed to be... some kind of monstrous animal!
Animal, hahaha.\| You were right, that's how we used to be.
\| But thanks for Adam, his littile campions granted us this form
Eat?\. No, no, no. We didn't kill them.\|
We needed their essence as humans.\|
In fact, you are the ones who killed them.
On your way here, you must have destroyed a few of the stone guardians.\|
Those were the adventurers sent by Adam and Belle.\|
Every stone was a fragment of their existence, \.
frozen in time, waiting for their souls to be 'refined.'
They were turned into stone? \.Thats... monstrous!
Monstrous? We grant them the power beyond their lifes effort.\|
All we needed was their essence fair deal, isnt it?
So you think this is some sort of fair deal?
\|You used their souls for your own gain!
This is survival, evolution! Weve transcended our former selves.\|
The weak perish, the strong rise.\|
This is how this world works, there is nothing wrong with it.
It's time to vanquish the intruder!
Vashar drow, silnoth karesh; umbra talethar.
Now, all the actor are on the scene.
But where could they have gone?
I say we head up to the second floor and see whats waiting there.

Vashar drow, silnoth karesh; umbra talethar.
Now, all the actor are on the scene.
But where could they have gone?
I say we head up to the second floor and see whats waiting there.
Youve done what no other could.
Youve freed my castle from that creatures vile grasp, and for that,
I owe you my deepest gratitude.
Youve brought peace back to our home.
\|Its a gift we can never repay fully.
It wasnt easy, but we couldnt let such darkness fester here.
Easy? No, I wouldnt imagine it was.\|
But you triumphed nonethelesscourage, wisdom, and strength united.
Take this. Its the reward I promised, and its well-earned.
Now, theres another matter we must discuss.
The chess pieces you gathered... theyre part of the castles essence,
The chess pieces? You mean the one from the Chess broad?
Why do you need them back?
They were never meant to be separated from the castle.\|
But we have to use them to seal the monsters in this castle.
Other wise they would cause a worse disaster.
I know you risked much to find them, but their purpose is tied to this
Please, return them to me, so that the castle can heal completely.
...If we give them back, will the castle truly recover?
Yes, and more than thatit will remain a place of light and sanctuary,
as it was always meant to be.
You have our word. The castles magic will no longer be used
Youve not only saved us but given this castle a second chance.
May your journey ahead be filled with the same courage and kindness
It spoke out of spite. Monsters do that. They twist words to plant doubt.\|
But I see you wont be satisfied until I explain.
Enough stalling. If you want our trust, youll tell us everything.
The beast was born from me... and Bella. The curse on is not plain vile.
It's also the power to protect my love ones.
I can't just sit here an watch everyone I love to fade, so I must
have power, for Bella, for all of us.
You chose to create a monster?\.
To scarfice innocent people for your "power"?
Do you know how many people will die in suffering?
Those who came here seeking glory knew the risks.\|
Every adventurer, every championthey became part of the story.\|
My story. Our story. They shall be remembered.
Without them, we fade into obscurity, forgotten like dust in the wind.
The beast, the adventurers, even you\|
youre all threads in a grand tapestry Ive been weaving for years.
You used us? You let people die just to keep your story alive?
And why not? A tale must never end.
\|If it does, everything weve fought for...
I wont let it end. Not like this.\|
If I must become the villain to keep the story alive, then so be it.
Alice, \P[1], just give me the chess pieces... and leave this place.\|
Youve done enough. Youve defeated the beast, freed the castle, saved
Youre the hero now. Isnt that enough for you?
We will remember you story, Adam.
You have made the wise choice.\|
Youve not only saved us but given this castle a second chance.
May your journey ahead be filled with the same courage and kindness
